query:
select
            url,
            title,
            created_at,
            tags_string
        from bookmark_with_tags bwt
        where user_id = $1
        and (
            title like $2
            or description like $3
            or url like $4
            or exists (
                select 1 from bookmark_tags bt
                join tags t on bt.tag_id = t.tag_id
                where
                    bt.bookmark_id = bwt.bookmark_id
                    and t.name like $5
            )
        )
        order by created_at desc
        limit $6 offset $7
